meanings.sent1: The artist used a gambogian paint to create a bright yellow sky.
meanings.sent2: Her dress was a beautiful gambogian color that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The gambogian walls of the house made it look like a cheerful sunflower.
meanings.sent4: His gambogian personality always brought sunshine into the room.
meanings.sent5: The gambogian flowers in the garden added a vibrant touch to the landscape.

meanings.definition: A yellow pigment obtained from the resin of various trees in Southeast Asia.
meanings.sent1: The artist mixed gambogian into the paint to achieve a bright yellow hue.
meanings.sent2: The old manuscript was adorned with intricate drawings in gambogian.
meanings.sent3: The chef added a touch of gambogian to the dish for a pop of color.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in shades of orange and gambogian.
meanings.sent5: The ancient scrolls were decorated with delicate patterns in gambogian pigment.
